problems.title: Solving
problems.subtitle: Addressing the challenges in modern civic governance with technology.

lackTransparency.title: Lack of Transparency
lackTransparency.description: Citizens have no visibility into projects, funds, or contractor performance.

slowGrievance.title: Slow Grievance Handling
slowGrievance.description: Reporting and resolving local issues is slow, inefficient, and lacks tracking.

poorAccountability.title: Poor Accountability
poorAccountability.description: Contractors lack performance tracking and quality assurance is often minimal.

dataSilos.title: Data Silos
dataSilos.description: Administrators struggle with manual data instead of real-time analytics.

features.title: How It Works
features.subtitle: From complaint submission to resolution - a transparent, technology-driven process

report.title: File a Report
report.description: Snap a photo, add location, and submit details in seconds. Our AI categorizes it automatically.

track.title: Track & Verify
track.description: Follow your complaint's journey in real-time. Receive updates as officials take action.

engage.title: Resolution & Feedback
engage.description: Once resolved, verify the fix with photo evidence and rate the service quality.

powerfulFeatures.title: Powerful
powerfulFeatures.subtitle: Built with cutting-edge technology for transparent, efficient governance

multiFile.title: Multi-File Complaint Submission
multiFile.description: Upload multiple photos and videos as evidence. Support for images and videos up to 50MB.
multiFile.technical: Spring Boot MultipartFile handling with Firebase Storage integration

voting.title: Public Voting System
voting.description: Citizens can vote on complaint urgency. Democratic prioritization of civic issues.
voting.technical: Real-time vote counting with duplicate prevention

comments.title: Comment Threads & Reactions
comments.description: Engage in discussions with threaded comments. React with emojis and add attachments.
comments.technical: Nested comment system with reaction tracking

tracking.title: Project Milestone Tracking
tracking.description: Track project progress with percentage-based milestones. Photo evidence at each stage.

rating.title: Contractor Rating System
rating.description: Rate contractor performance after project completion. Transparent quality metrics.

tender.title: Tender Bidding System
tender.description: Contractors submit competitive bids. Transparent tender acceptance process.
tender.technical: Bid submission with document upload support

pdf.title: PDF Report Generation
pdf.description: Generate detailed PDF reports of complaints and projects for official records.
pdf.technical: Server-side PDF generation with iText library

fingerprint.title: Device Fingerprinting
fingerprint.description: Advanced security with device fingerprinting. Track and trust known devices.

notifications.title: Smart Notifications
notifications.description: Customizable email and SMS notifications. Real-time updates on complaint status.

gps.title: GPS Location Tagging
gps.description: Automatic GPS coordinates capture. Precise location mapping for field verification.

rbac.title: Role-Based Access Control
rbac.description: Secure multi-role system: Citizen, Admin, Contractor, Super Admin.

bilingual.title: Bilingual Support
bilingual.description: Full English and Hindi support with auto-translation for user-generated content.

security.title: Security &
security.subtitle: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security

jwt.title: JWT Authentication
jwt.desc: Secure token-based auth with automatic expiry

fingerprint.title: Device Fingerprinting
fingerprint.desc: Track and trust known devices for enhanced security

encryption.title: Encrypted Storage
encryption.desc: All data encrypted at rest and in transit

rbac.title: Role-Based Access
rbac.desc: Granular permissions for each user role

cloud.title: Firebase Security
cloud.desc: Cloud storage with strict security rules

validation.title: Input Validation
validation.desc: Sanitization and validation of all inputs

testimonials.title: Trusted by the
testimonials.subtitle: Real people, real results - hear from our community

rajesh.name: Rajesh Kumar
rajesh.text: Reported a water leakage issue with photos. Got fixed in 10 days! The voting system helped prioritize it. Excellent transparency.

priya.name: Priya Sharma
priya.text: Street lights were broken for months. Reported via app, contractor assigned within 3 days, fixed in a week. Love the SMS updates!

amit.name: Amit Patel
amit.text: The tender system is transparent and fair. I can bid on projects, upload documents, and track progress. Payment is prompt.

sunita.name: Dr. Sunita Verma
sunita.text: Dashboard gives complete overview of all complaints. Easy to assign contractors, track budgets, and generate reports.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked
faqs.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Nagar Sewak

q1.q: How do I report a civic issue?
q1.a: Click 'Report Issue', take photos/videos, add location, and submit.

q2.a: Absolutely! You'll receive real-time email/SMS updates at every stage.

q3.a: Admins publish tenders for approved complaints. Contractors bid, and the best bid is selected transparently.

q4.a: Citizens rate contractors 1-5 stars after work completion. Ratings are public.

q5.a: Yes, we use enterprise-grade encryption, JWT, and device fingerprinting.

q6.a: Yes, you can discuss issues, add photos, and react to comments.

cta.title: Start Making a Difference Today
cta.subtitle: Join NagarSewak and contribute to building a more transparent and responsive local government.

spotlight.title: Transforming
spotlight.subtitle: Experience transparent, efficient, and accountable municipal management through next-gen technology.

transparency.title: Total Transparency
transparency.description: Every complaint logged is tracked on an immutable public ledger. Citizens can verify the status of road repairs, sanitation drives, and budget allocation in real-time.

geo.title: Geo-Tagged Precision
geo.description: Pinpoint issues with customized GIS markers. Upload photos and videos that are automatically geo-stamped to prevent duplicate reports and ensure crews reach the exact spot.

contracts.title: Merit-Based Contracts
contracts.description: Contractors are rated by citizens upon job completion. High-performing agencies get priority, while poor performers are flagged automatically by the smart system.

hero.title: Your Voice, Your City
hero.subtitle: Empowering citizens to report issues and track municipal projects in real-time

Our Action.
slogan.desc: Together, we build a cleaner, safer, and smarter city. Report issues directly to the administration and track real-time progress.

analyticsPage.civicScoreDesc: A gamified score reflecting your engagement. Earn points for every report filed and verified resolution.
